sample_rows.long_description: SCHEDULE set on 12/19/96 by Hon. David H. Coar : Markman Hearing hearing reset for 10:00 1/9/97 . Telephone notice (pm) (Entered: 01/06/1997)
Proposed Interim Protective Order by Genentech, Inc. received for approval by the Court. (scj) (Entered: 11/15/1996)

Jury trial held; testimony heard on behalf of defendant; witnesses sworn; evidence submitted on behalf of defendant; plaintiff and defendant rest; testimony continued on behalf of defendant; oral and written motions for judgment by defendants Opti and TriTech; Opti's motions for judgment as a matter of law denied; Opti's motion regarding damages taken under advisement/carried; TriTech orally joins Opti regarding damages; their motion also carried and taken under advisement; Court grants TriTech's motions regarding 271(g) and overules all other motions written and oral; Court grants Crystal's motions regarding "best mode" and "inequitable conduct" as to 899 patent; "best mode", "inequitable conduct" and "on-sale bar" as to 841 patent and overruled all other motions (written order forthcoming); rebuttal testimony heard; plaintiff and defendant close; jury recessed until 5/13/99 at 8:30; charge conference held; jury notes filed (extraneous in nature) (fe) (Entered: 05/13/1999)
Transcript of Proceedings re: Charles Tuan's motion to quash subp duces tecum for date of 5/1/98 (Entered: 08/11/1998)

ORDER (2 pgs) amending consolidated case management order by Judge David W. McKeague; dispositive motions filing ddl extended to 2/1/98; discovery extended to 1/1/98; Final Pretrial Conference rescheduled to 3:30 p.m. on 6/1/98; Jury Trial rescheduled to 7/98 trial term, any motion for separate trial of some or all claims in either consolidated action must be filed by 5/1/98; pltf shall file its briefs on claim construction issues NLT 2/1/98; defts shall file their briefs NLT 3/1/98; Settlement Conference set before Magistrate Judge Scoville in the Nedgraphics case rescheduled to 9:30 a.m. on 5/27/98 and in the Cadtex case rescheduled to 5/29/98 @ 9:30 a.m. (cc: all counsel on 10/31/97) (lkd) (Entered: 10/31/1997)
